question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Outdoor Warning Sirens, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs
evidence_answer: Citywide Guardrail Replacement, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, Emergency Warning Sirens project
extracted_search_list: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs
